EmailTemplate.name: Sending the personalized Financial Plan E-mail
EmailTemplate.subject: Financial Plan
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Name},
I am happy to inform you that your Financial Plan is ready for you to review. I congratulate you on embarking upon this journey with Ffreedom Financial Planners and I am glad that you have decided to dream.decide.do your way to happiness.
Please note that I am available to answer any questions/queries that you may have regarding your Financial Plan. Thank you once again for choosing Ffreedom to be your trusted Financial Planner.
Regards,
